description: Young adults in Singapore are taking to social media to share their inpatient experience at IMH and more. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: I have mental health struggles. Let’s talk about it
title_page: I have mental health struggles. Let’s talk about it | The Straits Times
maintext:
Contains content on suicide and depression
SINGAPORE –It looks like just another make-up tutorial on TikTok. As Ms Lim Jia Jun, 28, begins applying her foundation, she casually mentions: “Staying in IMH changed my life. Mostly because I admitted myself out of sheer desperation.”
